item.title: Nike and Lego Join Forces on a New Collection Featuring Sneakers, Sets, Apparel and More
item.description: In a new partnership to promote being active and creative, Nike and Lego has joined forces on a new collection of footwear and play sets for people of all ages. With prices starting at $40, the Nike x
